author: Source: Wimbledon Guardian
title: Stephen Merchant to guest star in hit US comedy The Big Bang Theory - Wimbledon Guardian
text:
Stephen Merchant, best known for his collaborations with Ricky Gervais, will guest in an upcoming episode of The Big Bang Theory. The US comedy, currently airing its ninth season on E4, is the show to be seen in judging from the impressive list of guest stars.
Start the conversation, or Read more at Wimbledon Guardian.
